channel.title: SnowGuns
channel.description:
[img]http://i.celebs.com/lt/000/068/955/68955.jpg[/img] [i][b]SnowGuns.. now they strike back[/b][/i]
A couple of days ago, I found an old visual basic project that I didn't complete for the christmas-gameprogramming-challenge. I've rewritten all of it in C#
Features right now: Map loading & rendering Player rendering Walking & collisions You can go from one map to another (A button to view all the tiles on the map, red: collision)
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uEp69QQrgDg
If you want, you can try it out: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?rc5cee55z1cl8nf]Download - 47.4KB[/url]

item.title: SnowGuns
item.dc:creator: @Kattoor Snow_
item.description:
@Kattoor wrote:


SnowGuns… now they strike back

A couple of days ago, I found an old visual basic project that I didn’t complete for the christmas-gameprogramming-challenge.
I’ve rewritten all of it in C#

Features right now:
Map loading & rendering
Player rendering
Walking & collisions
You can go from one map to another
(A button to view all the tiles on the map, red: collision)

If you want, you can try it out: Download - 47.4KB
